title: CounterTack | MCSI Executives to Speak at Upcoming Industry Events
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/16/2015 @ 3:35 AM   CounterTack | MCSI 
WALTHAM, Mass. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- CounterTack | MCSI , the leader in Big Data Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR), today announced that key company executives will be presenting at numerous industry events in the U.S., Canada and in the APAC region over the next few weeks. 
Cloud Partners Who: CounterTack | MCSI Chief Technology Officer, Michael Davis, will speak on a panel with Andy Daudelin, VP, Cloud and Cloud Networking, AT&T and Bernie McGroder, VP, Sales Engineering, GTT Communications Inc., led by moderator Bill Brenner, Senior Tech Writer, Akamai. He will also present individually. What: Panel discussion titled, “Cloud Risk: Hype vs. Reality,” and session titled, “Adding a Cloud Security Practice.” When: Panel on Wednesday, September 16, at 12:30 p.m. in Boston, MA and session on Thursday, September 17, at 11:15 a.m. at the Hynes Convention Center, Boston, MA. Who: CounterTack | MCSI Vice President, Security Strategy, Tom Bain What: What’s Hot session titled, “Why You’ll Care More About Mobile Security in 2020.” When: Thursday, September 17, 3:50 – 4:50 p.m., at Renaissance Atlanta Waverly Hotel & Convention Center, Atlanta, GA. Who: CounterTack | MCSI Vice President, Security Strategy, Tom Bain What: Session focused on next-generation endpoint detection and response. When: Friday, September 18, 8:50 – 9:20 a.m., at Renaissance Atlanta Waverly Hotel & Convention Center, Atlanta, GA. Who: CounterTack | MCSI Senior Vice President, Raj Dodhiawala What: Session focused on next-generation endpoint detection and response. When: Monday, September 21, 1:45 p.m., in Boston, MA. 
Army Cyber Institute: Cyber Talks Who: CounterTack | MCSI CTO, Michael Davis What: Session titled, “Scaling Endpoint Protection to Counter Advanced Threats: Continuous System and Behavioral Monitoring for Intelligent Incident Response.” When: Tuesday, September 22, at Lincoln Hall, National Defense University, Washington, DC. Who: CounterTack | MCSI Vice President, Solution Architect, Wade Lance What: Session titled, “Detecting the Presence of Advanced Adversaries with Big Data Endpoint Detection and Response.” When: Wednesday, September 23, and Thursday, September 24, at the Montreal Convention Center, Montreal. Who: CounterTack | MCSI Vice President, Security Strategy, Tom Bain What: Solutions Showcase session titled, “It’s All About That Data: Turning Security Information into Real-Time Intelligence.” When: Tuesday, September 29, 5:30 p.m. at the Javitz Convention Center, New York, NY. Who: CounterTack | MCSI CTO, Michael Davis, will participate in a panel discussion with Jay Abraham, Manager, Product Marketing, Mathworks, Stephanie Preston, Cyber Embedded Systems Engineer, Battelle, and Jothy Rosenberg, Associate Director, Cyber Systems, Draper Laboratory. What: Panel discussion titled, “Practically Addressing MedTech Cyber Security Issues.” When: Thursday, October 1, in Cambridge, MA. Who: CounterTack | MCSI Vice President, Solution Architect, Wade Lance What: Session focused on simplifying users’ cyber security experience. When: Wednesday, October 7, 3:15 p.m. at the Suntec Singapore International Convention & Exhibition Centre, Singapore. Who: CounterTack | MCSI CTO Michael Davis What: Session focused on next-generation endpoint detection and response. When: Thursday, October 8, at the Sheraton Centre Hotel, Toronto, Ontario, Canada. 
About CounterTack | MCSI 
CounterTack | MCSI is the leading provider of real-time, Big Data endpoint detection and response technology for the enterprise. CounterTack | MCSI provides unprecedented visibility and context around operating system and binary behaviors to detect zero-days attacks, rootkits, targeted malware and advanced persistent threats, enabling our customers to improve incident response and advanced threat detection, enterprise-wide. 
Built on Big Data architecture to counter endpoint threats at-scale and leveraging tamper-resistant collection for pure behavioral capture on enterprise endpoints, (laptops, servers, workstations, mobile devices) CounterTack | MCSI dramatically reduces the impact of advanced threats in real-time and post-incident, giving teams an opportunity to defend the enterprise across the entire cyber kill chain. Our 200+ customers leverage next-generation solutions on a global scale, across verticals and within a strategic partner ecosystem that includes MSSP and professional services around incident response and threat remediation.
